author: Staff Reporter
Karthik Madhavan
text:
Tasmac outlets

to remain closed

The district administration has said that all Tasmac outlets will be closed on January 16, 24 and 26 on the occasion of Tiruvalluvar Day, Vallalar Day and Republic Day respectively. If vending outlets or bars were open, there will be penal action, the administration has warned.
title: No meat sales on January 16
